ygData.subject: What's going on?
ygData.msgSnippet: Christina, I don t know why, but your email came to ME. It says to Gay48, but I ve never registered under anything like that. I am on Rodcet and am
ygData.messageBody:
Christina,

I don't know why, but your email came to ME. It says to Gay48, but
I've never registered under anything like that. I am on Rodcet and am
Gaiwan/Gotham/Greymaulkin. What seems to be going on with it?
-----Original Message-----
From: Christina [mailto:tina@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 14, 2001 6:48 PM
To: gay48
Subject:



Ok I am looking into banning this specific email address....

If Yahoo won't let me ban this I will move the list to another provider.

- Christina
